summary: ON MY WAY TO WORK IN THE MORNING ON A BACK COUNTRY ROAD, I WENT AROUND A 90 DEGREE TURN, BRAKING BEFORE GOING INTO THE TURN.  ON THE WAY OUT OF THE TURN, THE ENGINE STALLED AS I WAS TRYING TO ACCELERATE.  I CAME TO A STOP, PUT THE VEHICLE IN PARK, AND THEN IT RESTARTED WITH NOT PROBLEM, BUT SHOCKED ME A BIT.  *TR
